articles.title: Four Indians Drown At Philip Island Beach In Australia's Victoria - NDTV
articles.description: Four Indians drowned off an unpatrolled beach at Phillip Island in Australia's Victoria on Wednesday. The victims - a man and two women in their 20s and another woman in her 40s - belonged to an extended family, local media reported.
articles.content:
Three of them had died at the scene while the fourth victim died in hospital. (Representational)
